description: At the young age of 14, Vincent’s great-grandfather climbed aboard the “Giuseppe Verdi” and commenced a hopeful voyage from Italy to Ellis Island in pursuit of the American Dream. Today, Vincent himself is demonstrating this familial bravery and ambition as he climbs aboard his very own “Green Joe” Coffee Truck and brews his very own dream from the ground up with every cup of joe that he serves. Ask anyone in Albuquerque and they’ll tell you that they ADORE Vincent and his attentive customer service, his passion for benefitting the community, and of course his talent for concocting incredibly delicious coffee and tea. So if you’re looking to support one of the loveliest local businesses around, come visit this truck that’s as green as New Mexico’s favorite chile, as well as this beloved barista who’s pretty much the best thing to happen to this town since Breaking Bad.
name: Green Joe Coffee Truck
